job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
We are presently looking for an experienced Software Engineer to join a team focused on developing software that aids in the collection and processing of images. Our customers' appetite for images is unbounded and you will help meet their needs by designing/building/supporting a variety of applications that enable us to collect, catalog, and process more images, more efficiently, and with higher quality.

BA/BS in Computer Science or related technical field
3+ years of software development experience
2+ years experience developing with Python, Java or other OO languages
Built applications using relational databases such as MySQL, Postgresql
Experience with HTML, JavaScript (React & JQuery), CSS
Experience building and supporting batch or real-time data processes with technologies including Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible, AWS Lambda
A solid foundation in software development and software design principles
Experience with Agile methodologies such as Scrum and test-driven development
Strong communication skills; you’ll be interfacing with users and other technical teams
Ability and passion for learning new technology
